events.name: Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns at Marshall Thundering Herd

headlines.description: — Levi Lewis passed for 270 yards and a touchdown and rushed for another 74 yards, and No. 16 Louisiana-Lafayette defeated Marshall 36-21 in the New Orleans Bowl on Saturday night to end its season on a program-record 13-game winning streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lewis leads No. 16 ULL to 36-21 N.O. Bowl win over Marshall

video.headline: Montrell Johnson extends Louisiana's lead late in 4Q

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Montrell Johnson extends Louisiana’s lead late in 4Q) 2021/12/19 ESHEET

events.name: Western Kentucky Hilltoppers at Appalachian State Mountaineers

headlines.description: — Bailey Zappe capped his record-setting season in style, and Western Kentucky capped a difficult week with a bowl win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zappe gets records, WKU rolls past App St 59-38 in Boca Bowl

video.headline: Bailey Zappe throws 6th TD pass on the day

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Bailey Zappe throws 6th TD pass on the day) 2021/12/18 ESHEET

events.name: UTEP Miners at Fresno State Bulldogs

headlines.description: — Jordan Mims ran for 165 yards and two touchdown and caught five passes for 71 yards and another score to help Fresno State beat UTEP 31-24 on Saturday in the New Mexico Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fresno State beats UTEP 31-24 in New Mexico Bowl

video.headline: Fresno State fends off UTEP's comeback effort to win New Mexico Bowl
